conversion_verification.notes: 3D cutaway/isometric view with extruded walls, visible thickness, and readable interior volumes; ceiling/roof is removed to expose rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with clear wall height/thickness, good corner geometry, and a clean cutaway; perspective is stable and interior is easily readable.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall outer footprint and main zones roughly match (bedroom + living/dining + kitchen side), but the plan’s foyer and utility separation is not faithfully reproduced and several internal partitions/door placements are simplified or missing.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present (bed, sofa, dining set) and kitchen elements included; bathroom is simplified (toilet shown but other typical fixtures are missing/unclear).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good visibility and minimal artifacts; openings and room boundaries are readable, though some plan features are overly simplified.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity loss: foyer and utility room from the 2D plan are not clearly or correctly partitioned in the 3D model; kitchen/entry zoning appears more open than the plan.
Doors/openings are incomplete or not placed as per the 2D plan (several door locations/swings not represented).
Bathroom fixtures are incomplete (toilet present but sink/shower elements are missing/unclear compared to a typical plan representation).

summary: A true and clean 3D cutaway conversion with strong fundamentals, but only moderate geometric fidelity due to missing/simplified internal partitions (notably foyer/utility) and incomplete door/opening accuracy.
